title: Frizz Ease Heat Defeat Protective Styling Spray By JOHN FRIEDA, 6 Ounce
description: Works with heat tools. Conditions and strengthens for up to 24 hours. ThermaGuard complex protects against damage. Defend straight styles to the end. This protective spray straightens strands for up to 24 hours. This helps block humidity and rehydrates.

title: Suave Professionals Moroccan Infusion Moroccan Argan Styling Oil, 3 Ounce
Bed Head Control Freak Serum by TIGI for Unisex - 8.45 oz Serum
description: Tigi bed head control freak serum removes the frizz and tames your curly hair. Use tigi bed head control freak serum on wet or dry hair. Control freak serum is non-oily, airy and moisture resistant. Give your hair great, brilliant shine....
